Package it.polimi.ingsw.clients.singleplayer.controller

Class LocalGameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.clients.singleplayer.controller.LocalGameController
public class LocalGameController extends Object
Class LocalGameController is the controller class for the local single player game.
Author:
Alessio Piovesan, Pier Giorgio Prosperi, Matteo Salamone

    • addFaithPnt

      public void addFaithPnt​(List<Colours> waste)
      Method addFaithPnt is used to move forward on the faith track
      Parameters:
      waste - is the marble not used by the player
      See Also:
      Board.moveFT(int)

    • cardLeadAction

      public void cardLeadAction​(CardLeader cardToBeActivated)
      CardLeadAction handles all of the Leader Cards' powers. 01,02,03,04: Resource discount 05,06,07,08: Adds a special depot with two additional spaces for resources. 09,10,11,12: White marble becomes the specified resource. 13,14,15,16: Additional production power.
      Parameters:
      cardToBeActivated - is the Leader card that is going to activate his power
      See Also:
      Board.setDiscount(Colours), Board.addLeaderSpace(Colours), Board.setMarketAlt(Colours), Board.setProductAlt(Colours)

    • cardDevAction

      public void cardDevAction​(CardDev cardToBeBought, int slot)
      CardDevAction is the action the player makes when he buys a dev card.
      Parameters:
      cardToBeBought - is the card who's going to be bought from the player
      slot - is where the bought card will be placed
      See Also:
      Board.buyCardDev(CardDev, int)

    • tossCardDev

      public void tossCardDev​(ColoursCards colour)
      Method tossCardDEv tosses a development card
      Parameters:
      colour - is the color of the card is being tossed

    • endGame

      public void endGame​(boolean winner)
      method endGame counts winning points for the single player in order to handle personal records
      Parameters:
      winner - is either the player or Lorenzo that has won the game
      See Also:
      Board.countWinPnt()
